trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: 定義可以用來修改服務合約產生的程式碼的合約產生期間呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement the IServiceContractGenerationExtension interface on a contract behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: 在合約行為上實作 IServiceContractGenerationExtension 介面 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>類型) 可讓您修改合約或端點編譯到程式碼時產生的程式碼。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom contract behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，自訂用來<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>將<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合的呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>期間</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>自訂合約行為插入</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改的程式碼文件物件模型的合約產生處理之前的實作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName> to modify the contract, operations, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> prior to code generation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName>修改合約、 作業或<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName>產生程式碼之前。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The code generated context to use to modify the code document prior to generation.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼產生的內容，用於修改之前產生的程式碼文件。
